full_text: Faiaetno a El: aa IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2019/KER/1209 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICH K.ABRAHAM MATHEW WEDNESDAY, THE O9TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 19TH POUSHA, 1940 Cr1.MC.No. 8594 of 2018 AGAINST LP 10/2003 of J.M.F.C.-II, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM CRIME NO. 111/1992 of Poonthura Police Station , Thiruvananthapuram PETITIONER: SUDHEER, AGED 42 YEARS S/O. ABDUL KHADER, PUDUVAL PUTHEN VEEDU, TC NO.46/296, PARUTHIKUZHI, AMBALATHARA WARD, MUTTATHARA VILLAGE, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM DISTRICT BY ADV. SMT.N.P.ASHA RESPONDENT: STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, KOCHI-682 031 SENIOR PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI.C.S.HRITHWIK THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Pipl apa Crl.MC.No. 8594 of 2018 2 20191KER/T209 ORDER Petitioner was the sixth accused in Crime No. 111 of 1992 of Poonthura Police Station registered for the offences under Sections 143, 147, 148, 395, 436 and 452 read with Section 149 IPC. After the final report was filed two cases were taken on the file of the First Additional Assistant Sessions Judge, Thiruvananthapuram as S.C.No.65 of 2000 and S.C.No.427 of 2000. As the petitioner was absconding his case was removed to the register of long pending cases, the number being L.P.No.10 of 2003 on the file of the Judicial Magistrate of First Class-IlI, Thiruvananthapuram. The accused who were tried were acquitted by Annexure A2 Judgment. The petitioner has now surrendered. His prayer is to quash the proceedings in the light of the acquittal of the co-accused. 2. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner and the learned Public Prosecutor. Pipl apa Crl.MC.No. 8594 of 2018 3 2019/KER/1209 3. I have perused Annexure A2 Judgment by which the accused who were tried were acquitted. I am satisfied that no purpose will be served by the trial of the petitioner. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed. The case re filed from L.P.No.10 of 2003 on the file of the Judicial Magistrate of First Class-II, Thiruvananthapuram is quashed so far as_ the petitioner is concerned. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE MC/09.01.19 Fe con a El: ene Crl.MC.No. 8594 of 2018 4 2019/KER/1209 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE-A1 CERTIFIED COPY OF FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO.111/1992 SUBMITTED BY THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, POONTHURA POLICE STATION BEFORE THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-II, THTIRUVANANTHAPURAM ANNEXURE-2 CERTIFIED COPY OF JUDGMENT IN sc NO.65/2000 AND SC NO.427/2000 PASSED BY 1ST ADDITIONAL SESSTONS JUDGE THIRUVANANTHAPURAM DATED 18.7.2016 RESPONDENT'S/S EXHIBITS: NIL MC (TRUE COPY) PA TO JUDGE
